issue.title: steelseries.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://steelseries.com/de-de/dashboard/support](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsteelseries.com%2Fde-de%2Fdashboard%2Fsupport) ### Comment > As long as Adguard for Windows is active - the support section is not working. > > Please refer to my comment below with video and filtering log as I tried it. ``` Username: @sonnyxq ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/1w3mje5ngwascc84840kk8skw0k084wqhdcotwrb6o.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/18ioutaowf40888owkk04okkok8wsg0fdgddrjicbk.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.22.3 (5240) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.26100.0` Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Disable cache for third-party requests,
Block third-party Authorization header

**Browser API**:
Block WebRTC,
Block Push API,
Block Location API

**Windows tracking**:
Turn off Advertising ID

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Protect against DPI DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
AdGuard URL Tracking

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets,
AdGuard Annoyances

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
Phishing URL Blocklist,
Scam Blocklist by DurableNapkin,
uBlock Origin – Badware risks

Language-specific:
AdGuard German Custom filters: | `User rules (url: none)`,
`Anti-paywall filters (url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/liamengland1/miscfilters/refs/heads/master/antipaywall.txt)` Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | enabled Userscripts: | `AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)`
`AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js)`
`AdsBypasser (url: https://adsbypasser.github.io/releases/adsbypasser.full.user.js)`
`Bypass All Shortlinks Debloated (url: https://codeberg.org/Amm0ni4/bypass-all-shortlinks-debloated/raw/branch/main/Bypass_All_Shortlinks.user.js)`
`tinyShield (url: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js)` Userstyles: | disabled ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=win&product_version=7.22.3+%285240%29&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.26100.0&browser=chrome&filters=2.3.4.6.17.18.19.20.21.22.208.255.256.257.14&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29%252CAnti-paywall%2520filters%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fraw.githubusercontent.com%252Fliamengland1%252Fmiscfilters%252Frefs%252Fheads%252Fmaster%252Fantipaywall.txt%29&dns_servers=System&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%29%252C%250AAdsBypasser%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fadsbypasser.github.io%252Freleases%252Fadsbypasser.full.user.js%29%252C%250ABypass%2520All%2520Shortlinks%2520Debloated%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fcodeberg.org%252FAmm0ni4%252Fbypass-all-shortlinks-debloated%252Fraw%252Fbranch%252Fmain%252FBypass_All_Shortlinks.user.js%29%252C%250AtinyShield%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fcdn.jsdelivr.net%252Fnpm%252F%2540filteringdev%252Ftinyshield%2540latest%252Fdist%252FtinyShield.user.js%29&dns.filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=false&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=true&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=true&stealth.push=true&stealth.location=true&stealth.flash=false&stealth.java=false&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=true&stealth.block_third_party_auth=true&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=false&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=true&referrer=&win.wfp=true&license_type=paid&scheme_version=2&adblocking.enabled=true&dns.timeout=0&dns.fallback_mode=System&stealth.disable_windows_recall=false)

comment.body:
I am not sure if they are both with the same issue or collide with each other:

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/223866

issue.title: images.yandex.ru
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://yandex.ru/images/touch/search?text=%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%82+%D1%81+%D0%BB%D0%BE%D1%88%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B9+%D0%BF%D0%BE%D1%88%D0%B5%D0%BB+%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%85%D1%83%D0%B9&img_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcs16.pikabu.ru%2Fs%2F2025%2F08%2F01%2F17%2Fwu3cikmg_s.jpg&pos=3&rpt=simage](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyandex.ru%2Fimages%2Ftouch%2Fsearch%3Ftext%3D%25D0%25BA%25D0%25BE%25D1%2582%2B%25D1%2581%2B%25D0%25BB%25D0%25BE%25D1%2588%25D0%25B0%25D0%25B4%25D0%25BA%25D0%25BE%25D0%25B9%2B%25D0%25BF%25D0%25BE%25D1%2588%25D0%25B5%25D0%25BB%2B%25D0%25BD%25D0%25B0%25D1%2585%25D1%2583%25D0%25B9%26img_url%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fcs16.pikabu.ru%252Fs%252F2025%252F08%252F01%252F17%252Fwu3cikmg_s.jpg%26pos%3D3%26rpt%3Dsimage) ### Comment > В яндекс картинках адгард просто не работает. ``` Username: @Cesiumaurum ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/qtr0qw8f01csc8sgoogwgw4kc4g0cgt4fadvrz5sg8.jpg?nc=1)

filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt` Filters: | Ad blocking:

AdGuard Mobile Ads

AdGuard Russian Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | disabled ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=and&product_version=4.12.2&system_version=Android+13&browser=chrome&filters=2.11.1&dns_servers=https%3A%2F%2Fdns.google%2Fdns-query&android.mode=VPN&android.system_root=false&dns.filters=https%253A%252F%252Ffilters.adtidy.org%252Fandroid%252Ffilters%252F15_optimized.txt&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&https.filtering=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false&license_type=paid&dns.timeout=5000)

issue.title: 9gag.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [NSFW] [http://9gag.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2F9gag.com) ### Comment > 9gag.com started detecting AdGuard after I updated the app. ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/3ncz7aq3g9og008ss8wc00wgosg4kkkt7f9rtt8av4.png?nc=1) [Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/rnzokfj4gm8g8k8480w04os04kkgwkoc4b13cbc7so.png?nc=1) [Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/6yrcffz43boc4owkgs448wo4k00cw0cimz3d4mmka0.png?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.15 License type: | free DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
EasyPrivacy,
Peter Lowe's Blocklist,
Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media,
Fanboy's Social Blocking List

Annoyances:

Adblock Warning Removal List,
Fanboy's Annoyances

Language-specific:
AdGuard Russian

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [NSFW] [https://9gag.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2F9gag.com) ### Comment > After a set time or amount scrolled, pop up resets page and forces user to go to a screen showing how to disable Adblock ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/48fcttw2fda8g440cow8c4g4o0c84wwbd6naf50qa8.jpg?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.15 System version: | `iOS ` License type: | free Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList

Privacy:

Annoyances:
